text:
I stumbled upon this simple restaurant while searching for a dinner spot, and Iâ€™m so glad I did! This restaurant offers a fantastic Mala soup experience, and hereâ€™s why I highly recommend it:

**Variety of Ingredients:**
The restaurant boasts a wide selection of fresh ingredients for customers to choose from. Whether youâ€™re a meat lover, seafood enthusiast, or veggie fan, thereâ€™s something for everyone. The freshness of the ingredients really stood out and added to the overall quality of the meal.

**Soup Bases:**
There are several soup bases to choose from, and I opted for the classic Mala broth. The broth was incredibly flavorfulâ€”spicy, aromatic, and deeply satisfying. It had the perfect balance of heat and richness, making every bite enjoyable.

**Condiments Counter:**
The free condiments counter was well-stocked with a variety of sauces, fresh coriander, and chili. This allowed me to customize my dipping sauce to my liking, which added an extra layer of fun and personalization to the meal.

**Ambience:**
The restaurant has a clean, comfortable, and inviting environment. The seating was spacious, and the overall atmosphere made for a relaxing dining experience. Itâ€™s a great place to enjoy a meal with friends or family.

**Price:**
Considering the quality of the ingredients, the delicious broth, and the overall experience, the price was very reasonable. It felt like great value for money, especially for a satisfying Mala soup meal.

**Overall Impression:**
The restaurant exceeded my expectations. From the fresh ingredients and flavorful broth to the well-stocked condiments counter and comfortable setting, everything was on point. Itâ€™s a must-visit for Mala soup lovers or anyone looking for a tasty and enjoyable dining experience.

**Rating:** 5/5
- Pros: Fresh ingredients, delicious Mala broth, well-stocked condiments counter, clean and comfortable environment, reasonable prices.
- Cons: None worth mentioningâ€”it was a fantastic experience overall!

Iâ€™ll definitely be returning to this gem of a restaurant! Highly recommended!

13 Apr 2024

This shop just opened a few weeks ago. We continue to believe that  every new shop having one chance to impress us, ðŸ˜„ and tried the foods in this store.

First we did not see the price tags so we just selected a few ingredients for the mala ban (dry mala sauce and peanut taste in it). Once we tasted the food, we decided to go with another bowl and this time with bone broth. Also have peanut taste. Interesting favor.

The lady boss came to check on us for the taste of their food. During our conversation, she realized by herself that some people may be allergic to peanuts.

MSG level ok.

Can revisit.
Good food here. Order tomato soup and a bone broth soup. Taste is awesome.

I recently came here because of a friend who told me about this newly open restaurant. To be honest i was impressed by the variety of options available. Since i canâ€™t handle spicy food, i opted for the tomato broth instead, and it did not disappoint me!! The soup was incredibly flavourful and exceeded my expectations. Haha i say until a bit over liao>

If youâ€™re looking for a vibrant spot to enjoy delicious Chinese cuisine. This place serves customizable malatang with fresh ingredients and a flavorful broth that stands out. The cozy atmosphere and friendly staff make it even better. Itâ€™s perfect for spice lovers who want to tailor their meals just the way they like. Definitely worth a visit if youâ€™re in the area!!!!
